"Ah, <%me>.": "What are you up to?"
"Got some business down there?"

"We got a request from some people in Aelio
to investigate Maqaad's lower levels."

"I was just feeling the breeze
as I gathered my thoughts."

"Aye. Fulfilling a request
from some people in Aelio."

"I'm headed into Maqaad's lower levels
to carry out an investigation."

"As you're also likely aware, there's
a vast chamber beyond this entrance here."

"A chamber lined with a series
of massive structures."

"According to past literature, it's all
referred to as an \"energy plant\"."

"In other words, the devices inside were
made to produce some kind of energy."

"Alas, until recently, we've not been able to afford
the manpower for any investigations beyond that."

"We've only ever known this place
as \"Lenus Retem's stronghold\"."

"Now, however, we have a bit
more flexibility with our schedule."
"Which brings me to this request from Aelio."

"I've been interested in this place for
a while now, so I signed up for it."

"Aelio has also been sending some of their own investigators,
so we've been getting a lot of good data recently."

"It has all been a rather valuable
new experience for me, as well."

"Though things have been slow-going, we've uncovered
some interesting things about this plant."

"Like how certain portions
of it are still operating."

"It also appears that some of the power it
generates is being sent to Retem City."

"It seems that it can operate almost in perpetuity
without anyone having to maintain it."
"It's unlike any machine I could've imagined."

"In any case, it's ironic that a facility built by our
enemies is also being used to fuel our survival."
"...There is one more thing."

"Within the Maqaad facility, we found
something relating to the DOLLS."
"What kind of something?"
"Relating in what way?"
"I don't know the details yet."

"Just that the examiners from Aelio found something with
a connection to the DOLLS in one part of the facility."
"Ah, it's all still under investigation."

"Just that, in one part of the facility, they found something
with a composition similar to that of the DOLLS."

"We've always thought that it was just a building
that the DOLLS decided to gather in..."

"But if the DOLLS have some sort of relation
to the building itself, that raises some suspicions."

"...Well, we still can't draw
any conclusions at the moment."

"I'll keep you all informed
if we figure anything else out."

"Phew... Really though, who knew I'd find something
that would interest me outside of combat or music?"

"Perhaps in a different life, I would
have become a researcher."

"Goodness, life really is just a series
of unpredictable events, isn't it?"
